course_description: Students will assess/interpret/report pertinent findings on the history and physical exam. An emphasis on clinical decision-making, selection/interpretation of diagnostic tests; and hands-on practice of common procedures is included.
prerequisites: NRSG 528 or equivalent transfer credit as co-requisite.
